chapters.title: Prelude
chapters.info: Anath Dorje, p. 28—Selucia's former Soe'feia, or Truthspeaker. She now serves Tuon, allegedly. She is very tall and slender with dark skin and black eyes. She seems to get a charge out of inflicting pain. Anath is, of course, Semirhage, who had somehow managed to gain a significant amount of trust with the Seanchan in a very short period of time (as have the other Forsaken in their countries of choice). She conned several sul'dam/damane pairs into helping her attempt to capture Rand; in the process, she herself was captured and exposed. See also Semirhage.
